name: DEX VS STR
description:
Settle the age old debate on whether DEX or STR is the superior stat.

Fight against a computer enemy of the opposing stat, or face off against another player.

Player 1 Controls: WASD movement, Skill 1: V, Skill 2: B

Player 2 Controls: Arrow key movement, Skill 1: O , Skill 2: P

Credits:

bricks n stones - Programmer, Title Art, UI, Skill Animation

DustyTurtle - Character and Weapon Art/Animation, Music Composer, Splash Art

catsoupp - Programmer, Sound, Skill Animation
